# [Interview #1108: WOR-Omaha, NE, Entry #31](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=1108#31)

#### Kythis

Can they hold more than one Honorblade at a time?

#### Brandon Sanderson

That is theoretically possible.
